name: Haas Entrepreneurs Association
description:
The Berkeley Entrepreneurs Association (BEA) holds a distinguished position as the largest and oldest student association dedicated to entrepreneurship at UC Berkeley. At the core of our mission is the commitment to foster and support the entrepreneurial spirit among students and founders within the UC Berkeley community.

With a rich history and extensive network, BEA has become a thriving ecosystem that nurtures over 1,000 aspiring entrepreneurs. Our members come from diverse academic backgrounds, representing a wide range of disciplines including business, data science, computer science, and multiple hard sciences.

BEA takes pride in providing a dynamic platform where students can connect, collaborate, and learn from one another. Through a variety of initiatives, events, and resources, we aim to empower our members with the knowledge, skills, and networks essential for entrepreneurial success.

One of the key pillars of BEA's activities is our robust support system. We offer mentorship programs, workshops, and expert-led seminars that equip aspiring entrepreneurs with practical insights and guidance. Furthermore, our extensive network of alumni and industry professionals enables us to facilitate meaningful connections and valuable partnerships.

BEA's impact extends beyond the boundaries of the UC Berkeley campus. We actively engage with the local startup ecosystem, forging connections with investors, industry leaders, and other entrepreneurial organizations. This collaborative approach allows us to create opportunities for our members to showcase their ventures, gain exposure, and secure funding.

In essence, the Berkeley Entrepreneurs Association serves as a catalyst for innovation and entrepreneurship at UC Berkeley. By fostering an inclusive and supportive environment, we empower aspiring entrepreneurs to turn their ideas into reality, contribute to society, and shape the future of innovation.
summary: As the largest & oldest student association for entrepreneurship at UC Berkeley, our club fosters & supports entrepreneurship & founders, serving 1,000+ aspiring entrepreneurs across diverse academic disciplines.
